examples: She busies herself with her butterfly collection

definitions.text: actively or fully engaged or occupied
intrusive in a meddling or offensive manner
examples: bustling about self-importantly making an officious nuisance of himself

definitions.text: crowded with or characterized by much activity
(of facilities such as telephones or lavatories) unavailable for use by anyone else or indicating unavailability; (`engaged' is a British term for a busy telephone line)
